edu.uidaho.junicon.grammars.document

Class DocumentHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uidaho.junicon.grammars.document.DocumentHandler

  • public class DocumentHandler
extends Object
    Create, add nodes to, and print an XML document.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DocumentHandler()
      Constructor.
      DocumentHandler(String root_tag)
      Constructor that creates a document with the root node.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Element add_text_node_attributed(String tag, String[] attr_names, String[] attr_values, String text)
      Add a text node to the currently open node in the document, with an optional set of attribute names and values.
      Element add_text_node(String tag, String attr_name, String attr_value, String text)
      Add a text node to the currently open node in the document.
      Element close_tag()
      Close the currently open node in the document, i.e., pop it from the open node stack.

      Create a document with a root node.

      Get the string representation of an XML document.

      Test if node value equal to string.

      Add a child node to the currently open node in the document with an optional set of attribute names and values, and make it the parent for further added nodes.

      Add a child node to the currently open node in the document with an optional set of attribute names and values, and make it the parent for further added nodes.

      Add a child node to the currently open node in the document with an optional attribute name and value, and make it the parent for further added nodes, i.e., push it on the open node stack.

                        String attr_name,
                        String attr_value)
